Author: jorian#4555
Content: so how does LABS mining work again?

Author: jorian#4555
Content: all rewards go to a multisig?

Author: jorian#4555

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: no. 51% PoS

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: 49% PoW

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: and 33% ( it was 10% I increased it a lot) of the total BR of 10 is sent in one transaction to the multi sig address every 1440 blocks

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: BR is 10 LABS ...

Author: jorian#4555
Content: ahh. so that means 3.33 LABS per day go to the multisig

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: yes... with 33% ... it was 10% but this was far too low IMO

Author: jorian#4555
Content: what is the multisig good for?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: the multi sig is to pay notaries... I really couldnt figure out a way to make it pay them automatically. So we decided on a semi decentralised trust model of 15 ppl in a multi sig say 8/9 singers, that agree on a tally of notarisations (Alright has a py script that tallies them already)

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Then each node is paid realtive to it preformance

Author: jorian#4555
Content: ah of course, i was confused with easy mining from official notaries

Author: jorian#4555
Content: not all labs notaries will mine

Content: they can stake I think... but it will hurt their ntoarisation counts

Content: unless use diffrent node

Content: yes, different node
